name: Insert The Cassette
description:
You find a mysterious cassette at your doorstep, and things start to get weird as you figure out what is really happening.

Made for Brackeys 2020.2 Game Jam, with the theme being "rewind".

I hope you have fun playing the game! I'm new to game jams, and any feedback is always welcome!

Controls:

WASD - move

Left Click - interact

Esc - pause
